SA01nagdhdbu:3_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01nagdhdbu:3_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA01nagdhdbu:4_2: tadyathā- vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśaḥ vedanā jātirjarāmaraṇamiti /
SA01nagdhdbu:4_3: ime dharmāḥ api pañcabhyaḥ prakārebhya utpadyanta iti 'hetuprabhavāḥ' ityuktam /
SA01nagdhdbu:4_4: ke te pañca hetavaḥ? avidyā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ saṃskārā bhavaśceti /
SA01nagdhdbu:5_0: saptavidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ ca teṣāṃ hetūnāṃ nirodhastāvad 'hetuṃ teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaḥ' ityādinābhihitaḥ /
SA01nagdhdbu:6_1: vastūnāṃ yathā sthitiḥ, tasyā abhrāntatayā anyebhyo deśanād vā 'tathāgataḥ' /
SA01nagdhdbu:6_2: evaṃvidho yo deśakaḥ, yaścaivaṃ svayaṃ bodhakaḥ śravaṇaśīlayuktaśca sa 'evaṃvādī' (mahāśramaṇaḥ) ityuktaḥ /
SA01nagdhdbu:7_1: yo vādī vidvān vīraḥ tapasvī mahotsāhaḥ tīvravīryaḥ adbhutakarmakāri ca bhavati,
SA01nagdhdbu:7_6: yasya śiraḥ kapālaṃ vā agninā dīptam,
SA01nagdhdbu:7_7: tadavān iva 'tīvravīryaḥ tathā adbhutadharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkāritvād 'adbhutakarmakārī' iti /
SA01nagdhdbu:9_0: avidyāhetoḥ saṃskārāḥ, ityārabhya jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ (svabhāvataḥ siddhaṃ) kartāramanapekṣya samutpādastāvad 'anulomaḥ' /
SA01nagdhdbu:10_0: avidyānivṛtteḥ saṃskārādayo nivartanta ityupadeśakārakatvāt (bhagavān buddha eva) 'mahāśramaṇaḥ' iti /
SA01nagdhdbu:12_0: bhāratīyopādhyāyena jñānagarbheṇa 'mahālocāvā vande palacekmahābhāgena cānūdya saṃśodhya ca sunirṇītam /
